title: Declaration of Independence and Revolutionary War

vocab.definition: The document declaring American independence from Britain
Rights that all people are born with
Rights that cannot be taken away
The governing body of the American colonies
A complete change in government or way of life

teachingNotes: Focus on key ideas in the Declaration. Explain how revolutionary ideals influenced American government.
